comment: 00:03 Computer networks should possess four basic characteristics 01:06 Fault Tolerance ensures no loss of service 02:06 Fault Tolerance ensures no loss of service in case of failures 03:10 Scalability is the ability of a network to handle new devices and always give scope for newcomers 04:21 Voice-over IP phone is different from traditional land-line phone 05:27 IP phone data is given priority over other data 06:33 Computer networks should provide security for preventing unauthorized access, misuse, and forgery. 07:45 Computer networks should provide confidentiality, integrity, and availability with security measures.
